title: Choose your next steps
subtitle: Download the list from the supplier filtering tool
subtitle2: If you choose to continue and then decide you don’t want to use your shortlist of suppliers, you’ll have to close this project and start a new one.

items.text: I’d like to continue to pre-market engagement or write and publish my requirements

hint.text: You’ll be taken back to the procurement overview for this project and progress with your procurement activities. If you start any pre-market engagement or begin writing your requirements and then decide you don’t want to use the list of suppliers you created with this tool, you’ll have to close the project and restart from the beginning.
You’ll be able to resume your journey from there.

backJump.title: Return to See the available suppliers
